Warwick.Pontiac, Rhode Island:
Pontiac is a historic village in Warwick, Rhode Island and Cranston, Rhode Island.


== History ==
Native Americans referred to the area as "Papepieset" or "Toskiounke." After arriving in 1642, the early English settlers called the area "Great Weir" because fishing weirs were used to catch fish near the falls.
